Name: Pixel Fodder
About the game: Pixel Fodder is a old school platformer with a fully destructible world, a large choise of characters, incredible dynamics and gigaliters of 8-bit meat. Use all power of the pixels to defeat the bad guys and restore justice in this world! Fight for infantry, scientists, movie stars, knights, zombies, internet memes! Create your own adventures in the map editor, find out the whole story of Pixel Fodder Heroes campaign mode.

Meta Description: Looking for information on Pixel Fodder? Check out the release date (Jul 20, 2015), developer insights from Wacha, and a complete game summary.
